entry.title: Lemon Pepper Chicken
entry.summary: Basic Sous Vide lemon pepper chicken recipe
entry.content:
Tools:

  • Sous Vide setup
  • Quart freezer ziplock bags

Optional:

  • Parchment paper or aluminum foil as disposable workspace lining

Ingredients:

  • Chicken breast
  • Fresh lemon
  • Pepper
  • Salt

Optional:

  • Tarragon
  • Italian herbs

Instructions:

  1. Cut lemon into thin slices
  2. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and other covering onto workspace (aluminum foil, plate, etc)
  3. Cover chicken breast with spices by patting onto dusted workspace
  4. Place chicken breast w/ 1 lemon slice into freezer ziplock and do preliminary evacuation of air
  5. Refrigerate/freeze until ready to cook
  6. Cook sous vide at 140 deg F for 1hr 30min
  7. Serve

Comments:

Came out extremely well.

entry.title: Rice Pilaf
entry.summary: Simple rice pilaf recipe derived from a number of example recipes
entry.content:
Tools:

  • Instant pot pressure cooker

Ingredients:

  • 1/2 cup (90g) orzo
  • 1 cup (180g) rice
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1/2 tsp onion powder
  • 1/2 tsp pepper
  • 1/2 tsp tumeric
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 2 Tbsp peanut oil
  • 3/2 cup (360g) water
  • 1 cup (240g) broth (chicken stock)

Instructions:

Using an instant pot:

  1. Saute orzo and rice in oil until begin to brown (~8min?)
  2. Cancel cook and mix in remaining ingredients
  3. Cook for 8 min on high
  4. Stand for 10 min, release pressure.
  5. Open, fluff, and serve

Comments:

This recipe came out reasonably well, but could likely be adjusted for better taste, perhaps including some other herbs.
